channel.title: [PI] making items not drop on death?
channel.description:
How do i add items so when you die they still drop on the ground but are not visable to other players and also are not trade-able to others like torso, skillcapes and so on.
any1 know where i add or change these?

item.title: [PI] making items not drop on death?
item.dc:creator: @mithpkz mithpkz
item.description:
@mithpkz wrote:

find config.java and in their is lists of items untradeable, items cant be dropped, ect. add the items you want to not show up in those lines

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] making items not drop on death?
